org.dyn4j.collision

Class Fixture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.collision.Fixture
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BodyFixture

    public class Fixture
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a part of a Collidable.

    A Fixture has a one-to-one relationship with a Convex Shape. Each Collidable can have any number of Fixtures attached.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.5
    Author:
    William Bittle
